original_text: It was Mary who anointed the Lord with ointment and wiped his feet with her hair, whose brother Lazarus was ill.
korean_text: 이 마리아는 향유를 주께 붓고 머리털로 주의 발을 닦던 자요 병든 나사로는 그의 오라버니더라

sentences.original_text: who anointed the Lord with ointment
and wiped his feet with her hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 머리털로 그의 발을 닦아
